overview: Nicole dominates her men with the mysterious and tantalizing strength of a powerful woman! She dances above one loverâ€¦she makes another plead for her! She forces yet another to his knees and he becomes a slave to share with her friend! She controls and manipulates two frustrated men who willingly obey her! Nicole has the power to make a man beg and plead. When she lets you have her, you get all that you need!
title: The Power of Nicole
